title: MaryTodd release, 50% off!
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
--------------------------------------------------  
We are proud to announce our new release!  
--------------------------------------------------

[**'MaryTodd'** by Vicente Lamónaca](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414154130/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/marytodd/?refby=tipotype), with a release offer of 50% OFF!

If you'd like to **support the type designers** please purchase directly at [**TipoType.com (MeryTodd)**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414154130/http:/tipotype.com/mary-todd/) where the designer gets 80% of every sale.

[![MaryTodd](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414154130im_/http:/origin.myfonts.net/s/aw/original/272/0/139458.jpg "MaryTodd")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414154130/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/marytodd/?refby=tipotype)

author: ferfolio_2

comments.content: I'm puzzled by the marketing. Is there a connection between the design and the time/place of the Lincolns?

It's discounted, so you save pennies.

hhp
